Subject: RE: Penhaligon's - Yas Mall - Project Progress report

 

Dear Doris, 

 

Kindly find attached last week’s Project progress report for your reference.

Target handover on 25.09.25  excluding Authority inspection that will start after works completion.

 

**Tentative opening date is placed on 15 of October (upon receiving the below list pending documents)

 

Notes:

*	Tawtheeq received from mall on 04.09.25 – Which was expected on June however we went on site as an exception 
*	Trade license received on 08.09.25 – Which is delayed by 3 months by the mall, however we went on site as an exception
*	As you are aware due to no visibility on the above documents (Tawtheeq & TL), works on the wooden flooring and subsequent tasks were on hold until your confirmation on site to proceed with the floor on 04.09.25.

 

Below documents pending:

*	Require ADCD approved AMC (FA/FF) from client latest by 20.09.2025.
*	Require Pest control AMC from the client latest by 20.09.2025.
*	Hassantuk installation certificate required from client latest by 25.09.2025.
*	Fitness certificate required from client latest by 25.09.2025
*	Public liability insurance from client required latest by 15.09.2025
*	ADCD inspection request, inspection, completion certificate will take 7-10 working days after receiving all the above-mentioned client documents.

 

Kind Regards

Dana

 

dana eljilani

Dear Doris,

We are encountering a challenge since last week on the submission the UBO registration. In recent months, Abu Dhabi authorities have significantly tightened UBO disclosure requirements. They now mandate details of all entities/parties within the corporate structure up to the ultimate beneficial owner, even where shareholding percentages fall below the formal UBO threshold. We are currently waiting to receive documents from Puig SA legal team and will proceed once receive.

 

Best regards
